abstract: Kmart is teaming up with Draft FCB, the agency that won — then lost — the creative account of its major competitor, Wal-Mart Stores.
snippet: Kmart is teaming up with Draft FCB, the agency that won — then lost — the creative account of its major competitor, Wal-Mart Stores.
lead_paragraph: HOWARD DRAFT and his agency, Draft FCB, are back in the retail advertising business — and this time, they hope, it will be for longer than a couple of months.

headline.main: For an Agency, Life After Wal-Mart Is Called Kmart
headline.print_headline: For an Agency, Life After Wal-Mart Is Called Kmart

abstract: Draft FCB will create advertising campaigns for television, radio and magazines.
snippet: Draft FCB will create advertising campaigns for television, radio and magazines.
lead_paragraph: Kmart is changing its creative advertising agency after four years, hiring the agency that recently won — then lost — the creative account of its major competitor, Wal-Mart Stores.

headline.main: Kmart Hires Agency That Lost Wal-Mart Account
